name: Thalassa (gadaursan, starrydough)
description:
Maya is running late on a date and she's forgotten to get a gift. But she's got an excellent idea: why not pick up seashells along the way? Hopefully she can get enough seashells to impress her girlfriend Thalassa!

Thalassa is a 10-minute sidescroller created for My First Game Jam Summer 2019.

How to Play

  • Use the arrow keys to navigate the caves
  • Collect shells to impress your girlfriend
  • Avoid pointy things
  • P to pause the game
  • Volume can be adjusted in the main menu

Credits

  • Programming: starrydough & gadaursan
  • Art: gadaursan & starrydough
  • Music: "Beach" by Peritune
  • SFX: GUI Sound Effects #8 by jalastram (on OpenGameArt.org)
  • Developed in Godot
